description: Quality checks for data analysis, strategy, planning, and decision-support tasks

checks.name: Data Integrity
checks.description: Verify data is complete, accurate, and properly handled
criteria: All data sources clearly identified with provenance
No unexplained data loss or filtering
Raw data preserved or referenced for reproducibility

checks.name: Methodology Soundness
checks.description: Verify analytical approach is rigorous and justified
criteria: Analytical approach clearly stated and justified
Alternative methods considered and rationale for chosen approach documented
Sample sizes and confidence levels noted where applicable

checks.name: Conclusion Validity
checks.description: Verify conclusions are supported by the analysis
criteria: Every conclusion directly supported by presented data or analysis
No logical fallacies or unsupported leaps
Confidence level or uncertainty range stated for key findings

checks.name: Bias Assessment
checks.description: Check for selection, confirmation, or framing biases
criteria: Data selection criteria transparent and justified
Counterarguments or opposing data points acknowledged
Framing does not mislead about the strength of conclusions

passCriteria: Analysis must be methodologically sound, data-backed, and free from unacknowledged biases
